Class StepCountUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.StepCountUtil

  • public final class StepCountUtil
extends Object
    Static utility methods related to working with the step count.

      • getErrorUrl

        public static String getErrorUrl()
        Returns:
        the url users are redirected to when a step error occurs

      • isErrorRedirect

        public static boolean isErrorRedirect()
        Returns:
        true if users are to be redirected when a step error occurs

      • incrementSessionStep

        Increments the step that is recorded in session.
        Parameters:

      • getRequestStep

        public static int getRequestStep(Request request)
        Retrieves the value of the step variable from the given request.
        Parameters:
        request - the request being responded to.
        Returns:
        the request step present in the request, or -1 on error.

      • isStepOnRequest

        public static boolean isStepOnRequest(Request request)
        Checks if the step count is on the request.
        Parameters:
        request - the request being responded to.
        Returns:
        true if the step count is on the request

      • isCachedContentRequest

        public static boolean isCachedContentRequest(Request request)
        Check if the request is for cached content.
        Parameters:
        request - the request being processed
        Returns:
        true if content is cached, otherwise false
